title: Rum raisin loaf
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons rum', '75g (3 oz) raisins or sultanas', '100ml (4 fl oz) water', '275g (10 oz) bread flour', '1 dessertspoon dark brown soft sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '15g (1/2 oz) butter', '2 tablespoons double cream', '1/2 teaspoon rum extract', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '1 1/2 teaspoons dried active baking yeast']
